overview: A monument in the city of Almeria (Spain) pays tribute to the 142 local men killed during World War II at Mauthausen (Austria) extermination nazi camp. The shortfilm looks for the testimonies of Antonio Mu√±oz and Joaquin Masegosa: two survivors that, now in their eighties, fight against oblivion with memories that at times turn into nightmares.
title: Cerca del Danubio
